protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: This is one of the several different receptors for 5- hydroxytryptamine (serotonin), a biogenic hormone that functions as a neurotransmitter, a hormone, and a mitogen. This receptor mediates its action by association with G proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
